fields.helpText: When creating a new opportunity, it must meet the following naming convention: RCO: <Insert descriptive name> - <Year>. An example is: RCO: Aqueous Zinc Ion Battery Production - 2023.

fields.name: Record_Type_Alumni_Corporate
fields.helpText:
Corporate Partnership


Create a corporate partnership opportunity to identify new specific interactions with contacts and organisations to support and grow industry, corporate and educational partnerships.

fields.name: RecordTypeRadioButtons
fields.helpText:
Commercialisation


Create Commercialisation opportunity to protect and commercialise the university's intellectual property, including the licensing agreements and university start-ups.


International Projects Unit


Create an opportunity to explore international development and training initiatives.


Research Partnership


Create Research Partnership opportunity to support research and research training initiatives
